case_title: D.V. KRISHNA MURTHY vs P. VISWANATH

legal_provisions.section_49_indian_partnership_act: Payment of firm debts and of separate debts
legal_provisions.section_25_indian_partnership_act: Liability of a partner for acts of the firm

case_summary.issue: Attachment of property of a partner before judgment in a suit against the firm and its partners.
case_summary.lower_court_order: Attachment before judgment ordered by District Munsif, Hindupur.
case_summary.appellant_argument: Properties of individual partners cannot be attached before judgment under Section 49 of the Indian Partnership Act.
case_summary.court_ruling: Section 49 does not apply before decree. Partners are jointly and severally liable under Section 25. Court is competent to order attachment under Order 38, Rule 5, CPC.
